Articles.Content:
For your consideration the Koeing Company presents the Ptah Series

The Ptah series is named after the Egyptian god of Craftsmen and Architects (hence the use of Papyrus). https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ptah for more on Ptah.

The series can lift almost anything that you can throw at it from small craft to massive behemoths up to 100 metric tons. All lifters are capable of putting your spacecraft into a 150km-150km equatorial orbit for check out and testing.

Mods used are

NRAP

Ven's Stock Revamp

KVV

KW Rocketry

pFarings

Tweakscale

Looks like someone has been in Halls Of Origination too many times.

Kidding sleek realistic rockets, I like!
I like them, but the papyrus font sorta ruined it.

I like them, but the papyrus font sorta ruined it.

The ONLY reason I used Papyrus was because I named them after an EGYPTIAN god... If I had named then after another god of craftsmen I would have used a different font
